last_episode_to_air.name: Reptilian
last_episode_to_air.overview: A pair of New York City detectives investigates a series of missing person reports linked to underground raves held in abandoned subway tunnels. Their investigation uncovers a nest of reptilians who are preying on the party goers.

name: Lost Tapes
overview:
Lost Tapes is an American television horror series that aired on Animal Planet. Produced by Go Go Luckey Entertainment, the program presents found footage depicting traumatic encounters with cryptozoological creatures, including the Chupacabra and Bigfoot, and even supernatural creatures such as the Werewolf and Vampire, and extraterrestrials: Alien and Reptilian.

The pilot aired on Animal Planet October 30, 2008 for Halloween, but the series officially premiered on January 6, 2009. Animal Planet commissioned a second season, which premiered on September 29, 2009. Season 3 premiered on September 28, 2010, with episodes featuring zombies and the Kraken. The show also used to air on Planet Green.

episodes.name: Chupacabra
episodes.overview: When the Ramirez family attempts to cross into the United States from Mexico, they are stalked by a blood sucking Chupucabra.

episodes.name: Bigfoot
episodes.overview: While trying to stop poachers, park ranger Rachel Glen has a terrifying encounter with Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Monster of Monterey
episodes.overview: While on the last leg of her solo trip around the world, Sharon Novak encounters an underwater monster lurking in the deep water just outside of Monterey Bay.

episodes.name: Swamp Creature
episodes.overview: A university professor and her nephew explore the Honey Island ecosystem and have a terrifying encounter with a Swamp monster.

episodes.name: Oklahoma Octopus
episodes.overview: A group of young vacationers are stranded on a raft after an attack by a freshwater octopus.

episodes.name: Devil Dragon
episodes.overview: While filming the pilot for a survival reality show, Tim Akrin encounters a Megalania in the Daintree Rainforest of Australia.

episodes.name: Death Raptor
episodes.overview: A paranormal investigator looks into sightings of the Owlman at a church in California.

episodes.name: Cave Demons
episodes.overview: Three U.S. Marines descend into a cave near Tora Bora where they are attacked by an Olitiau.

episodes.name: Megaconda
episodes.overview: In an effort to find illegal exotic animals, two animal rights activists break into a textile warehouse only to discover a giant anaconda.

episodes.name: Thunderbird
episodes.overview: Three boys break into a restrict part of a national park in order to skateboard. One of them had a bad encounter with an enormous Thunderbird.

episodes.name: Skinwalker
episodes.overview: When college student Andy Miller returns home to his parent's ranch, he discovers that the animals on the ranch are falling victim to a Native American Skinwalker.

episodes.name: Mothman
episodes.overview: According to legend, the Mothman of West Virginia appears when disaster is bound to strike.

episodes.name: Deathworm
episodes.overview: While ATV racing in the Gobi desert, two friends encounter and film the Mongolian Death Worm.

episodes.name: Hellhound
episodes.overview: A prank by a group of goth college students goes awry when a Hellhound appears and attacks them.

episodes.name: Vampire
episodes.overview: A family moves into an old house intent on fixing it up. Unfortunately, a vampire lurks within the cellar.

episodes.name: Lizard Man
episodes.overview: A news reporter and cameraman follow two animal rescue workers into a sewer looking for a lost cat. Instead, they encounter a hostile lizard man.

episodes.name: Southern Sasquatch
episodes.overview: Two brothers take their future brother-in-law deer hunting in the Arkansas woods. The hunt goes astray when they run into the Fouke Monster.

episodes.name: Werewolf
episodes.overview: A young documentary director has an encounter with a werewolf when he rides with detectives who are searching for a serial killer.

episodes.name: Death Crawler
episodes.overview: A entomologist couple searches an island for unknown insect species. They discover that the jungle is teeming with giant centipedes.

episodes.name: White River Monster
episodes.overview: Two friends and a guide go noodling for catfish in Arkansas's White River. The fishing trip goes astray when the group is attacked by the White River Monster.

episodes.name: Jersey Devil
episodes.overview: A vacationing family encounters the Jersey Devil when returning home from the beach.

episodes.name: Alien
episodes.overview: After a mission in space, an astronaut returns with a strange rash. She is carrying an alien parasite which later terrorizes the hospital staff.

episodes.name: Bear Lake Monster
episodes.overview: A group of women go to a beach on Bear Lake in Utah to celebrate a birthday. Unfortunately, they have a terrifying encounter with the Bear Lake Monster.

episodes.name: Dover Demon
episodes.overview: Four friends go into the Massachusetts woods in a attempt to make hoax footage of the Dover Demon. Unfortunately, they run into the real thing.

episodes.name: Zombie
episodes.overview: The Enigma Corporation, a private security firm, is called in to investigate a New Orleans boarding house owned by a woman who was recently killed. They discover that the boarding house is teeming with zombies.

episodes.name: Kraken
episodes.overview: A group of treasure hunters go diving in the Baltic Sea intent on finding Tsarist Gold. They instead discover a Kraken who targets then and their boat.

episodes.name: Strigoi
episodes.overview: Enigma Corporation investigators are called in to investigate the mysterious deaths of workers at an oil rig. There they discover that the source of the death is a strigoi vampire.

episodes.name: Poltergeist
episodes.overview: Researchers from a paranormal television show investigate a boy who appears to manifest psychic powers. Their investigation, however, reveals that a dangerous poltergeist is responsible.

episodes.name: Devil Monkey
episodes.overview: A reporter follows a group of ATF agents making a raid on West Virginia moonshiners. Their raid goes astray when they run into a dangerous Devil Monkey.

episodes.name: Yeti
episodes.overview: A group of journalists sneak on-board a cargo vessel intending to break a story about a huge discovery made at Mount Everest. Unfortunately, they have an run with a Yeti that is loose on the ship.

episodes.name: Wendigo: American Cannibal
episodes.overview: A search and rescue team attempts to locate a group of lost hikers. What starts as a routine rescue mission quickly turns to horror when the team discovers that circumstances might have led the hikers to acts of cannibalism.

episodes.name: Q: The Serpent God
episodes.overview: A team from the Enigma Corporation investigate a series of ritual murders in Mexico. Their investigation uncovers a prehistoric Quetzalcoatlus.

episodes.name: The Beast of Bray Road
episodes.overview: A reporter and his cameraman meet with in the woods with members of a Wisconsin militia for an interview. The interview ends when the militia comes under attack from a wolf creature known as the Beast of Bray Road.

episodes.name: Reptilian
episodes.overview: A pair of New York City detectives investigates a series of missing person reports linked to underground raves held in abandoned subway tunnels. Their investigation uncovers a nest of reptilians who are preying on the party goers.
